title: thanigai vaLar
sahitya:
taNikai vaLar sharavaNabhavA nin thAL sharaNam
 taruNam idu karuNai purivAi taN shOlai

anupallavi

aNiyum navamaNi paNigaL dagadagena niraimati nEr
arumukhamum iLa nagai veNNilavum izha ulahu pugazh

caraNam

tuLLi viLaiyADi varum tOgai mayil mElE
vaLLiyuDan pei vaLai deivAnai iru pAlE
aLLi iru kaN parugum anbar pugazhvELE
veLLimalai nAthan taruvEl koL perumALE
